newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-Ingram Micro started at DMG.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Ingram Micro started at DMG.

text.p: -- Deutsche Morgan Grenfell said it started coverage of Ingram Micro Inc with accumulate.
-- Analyst Steven Fortuna said in a research report he projects 1997, 1998 and 1999 operating earnings per share of $1.13, $1.36, and $1.59 a share, respectively.
-- "With a forward price/earnings valuation in the 18x - 19x range we set a 12-month price target of $25 to $26, up roughly 20 percent from current levels", the report said.
-- The company went public in October at $18 a share and rose to 21-7/8 on its first day of trading.
